{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3327490,"name":"Jayden Sun","username":"CalamityCow","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/ebca7d/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-08T02:29:04.300Z","cooked":"

Hey guys this is some software guy,
Our build team had a stroke of genius and decided to put a REV Through Bore Encoder, on a Kraken. I am trying to figure out of to sync the two values of the kraken’s relative encoder and the absolute encoder. There seems to be this method that would work:

  • setSelectedSensorPosition()

but it seems to have been deprecated in the Phoenix 6 library. Does anyone know of the replacement function in phenoix 6?

In addition, there are also some things that would be nice to know, mainly if the through bore encoder values use the same units.

Thanks in advance
